snippet.title: Air Raid: This is Not a Drill gameplay (PC Game, 2003)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for Air Raid: This is Not a Drill, PC game produced by 1C Company in 2003 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/air-raid-this-is-not-a-drill/8824/
Air Raid: This Is Not a Drill is a simulation of firing a gun,. Anti-Aircraft. In each scenario, players receive a set number of  40mm AA ammunition, missiles to fend off enemy boats, air-gunners, air-bombers, torpedo bombers, ace fliers, and patrol aircraft.
Played through modern Windows machine.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
Sniper Elite: Berlin 1945 - https://youtu.be/M77sxxExfZY
Cyberia - https://youtu.be/RVar9s-JcZo
Star Wars: Rebel Assault - https://youtu.be/YYZIrNDAwD0
